alert.note: Alert for Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Windham, south central Worcester and northwestern Providence Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Putnam, or 13 miles north of Plainfield, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Smithfield, Killingly, Webster, Burrillville, Northbridge, Uxbridge, North Smithfield, Scituate, Glocester, Putnam, Thompson, Sutton, Douglas, Brooklyn, Woodstock, Foster, Pomfret and Millville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
